title: After a game ends I only get a small window
body: After my game ends and I click VICTORY ( I always win :D) the end game screen doesn't appear. Instead, there is a tiny window where a fraction of the screen is being shown in the top right. It won't let me click on anything, so I have to end up going to task manager and closing the game, to actually get it to work again. Any ideas on how to fix this?

replies.body:
It might be an issue with re-rendering your client after the game! D:
Give pressing 'ctrl+' or 'ctrl up arrow' to resize the client a shot, that should bring the game back without having to close it out in Task Manager. Lemme know how it works after you try! :)
I see that this thread is the old, but I would like to report the same issue.  I think it may have something to do with 4K scaling on windows.  Bug is also persistent through patches.

Thank you for the 4K comment. I just got a new monitor and have had this issue in my games since. Was afraid my client itself was just bugged or that I had messed something up when I changed resolutions inside both the game and client. This is apparently still an issue into the new season. Ctrl+ works, but I haven't been able to honor my teams until I found this thread. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Same, although with me I can mess around with some of the window resizing settings to get rid of the black portion on the bottom - however, the black portion on the right of the client remains.
I made the client the right size, but it added a huge black area around it. Like an extension of the window with just a huge black box.

Just to check, are you running LoL on a Mac or a PC? 
If you're on Mac, it's likely due to the client preventing hot corners from interfering if you're playing in Borderless. Tech might have a way of bypassing that, so hit them up in a ticket [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ) to check it out!

http://imgur.com/a/nltvn

Open up a game. When the game opens, Alt+Tab out. On your taskbar, not the client, but the game you have running, right-click it. Right-click LoL and click properties. Click compatibility. If you have "Run in 640x480 screen resolution" CHECKED, then uncheck it.

You're welcome.
